itinerary.mapNote: Imlil start. Mule path over first pass. 2279m.
Tacheddirt village passed. High shepherd pastures. 2900m.
Highest natural lake in High Atlas. 2313m.
Pre-dawn Toubkal 4167m summit. Descent to Imlil. 1740m.

waypoints.name: Jbel Toubkal Summit
waypoints.note: Highest peak in North Africa. 7–8hr round trip from refuge.

waypoints.name: Lac d'Ifni
waypoints.note: Highest natural lake in High Atlas. Remote and beautiful.

waypoints.name: Imlil Village
waypoints.note: Trek gateway. Mule market. Berber guesthouses. Tizi n'Test view.

waypoints.name: Tizi n'Ouanoums
waypoints.note: High pass on approach to Toubkal. Summit plateau edge.

waypoints.name: Toubkal Refuge (CAF)
waypoints.note: Last hut before summit. Crowded in summer. Stunning position.
